name: Are we bowling at all?
tagline: Code and data for the paper "Are we Bowling at all?"
body:
### Are we bowling at all? An analysis of the formation of social capital in online networks 
### (Working Paper)

All the data is available to download, as well as the code (R). 

Questions? j.sajuria[at]ucl.ac.uk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
